title: Netflix Says No to Buying Warner Bros., Paramount Might Take Over
summary: Netflix decided not to buy Warner Bros. Discovery's studio and streaming business because the price got too high. This means Paramount, another big company, might buy Warner Bros. instead. Paramount wants to buy all of Warner Bros., including popular shows and movies like Harry Potter and CNN. Netflix said it would have been a good owner, but only at the right price. This deal could change Hollywood by putting two big studios together. Some people worry this might make fewer choices for viewers and higher costs for streaming services.

background_read: This article talks about big companies in the entertainment world. Netflix, Warner Bros., and Paramount are all involved in making and showing movies and TV shows. When companies buy each other, it can change what we watch and how much we pay. This is happening in Hollywood, where deals like this can affect jobs and the types of stories told in films.

WHAT: Netflix decided not to buy Warner Bros., so Paramount might buy it instead.
WHERE: This is happening in Hollywood and affects the media industry.
WHY: Netflix said the price was too high, and Paramount wants to grow bigger by buying Warner Bros.
